actions.text: Committee on Veterans ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Veterans. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski with a preamble. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Approved for reporting without amendment unfavorably.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici unfavorably without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 242.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original resolution providing for the waiver of section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to S. 876 as reported by the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 876 (veterans' medical care).

titles.title: An original resolution providing for the waiver of section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to S. 876 as reported by the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
